Was at McDonald's Liang Court last night.. Heard on air on Mc's music.. 
Laserlight by Jessie J.. Followed by Amazing Grace (Gospel) ? And then Mercy by Duffy.. Followed by a hip hop song from Lil Wayne.. Seriously.. McDonald's.. U guys need to improve on the music programming since u guys decided not to air radio & assign someone to do music programming.. Every McDonald's are playing exactly the same programming.. 1 song new.. Follow by an old nostalgia song.. Then hip hop.. Slow.. Fast.. Old, new.. All mixed together.. I know u guys trying to cater to all ages but the way it was programmed is simply terrible.. 
I'm at McDonald's almost everyday coz I work at Clarke Quay n Mc is the only restaurant available after 3am.. And I hear the exact same song or shitty programming over n over again.. 
Please consider bringing back music from the radio station coz the programming is better.. 
No offense on this.. But why is there even a Gospel song inside the music programming? (*No religious offense here, so pls don't be sensitive over this)..
